title: Embroidery Sample, 1932-1-64, 1775–1805
medium:
Medium: silk and colored glass beads on a silk ground
Technique: embroidered on voided supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral pattern embroidered with multicolored silk and blue, silver and gold glass beads on a patterned black cisele velvet.
